Params[3]: Commandant, I'm here to see you.

Params[2]: Just, too much time on my hands.

Params[3]: Yeah... I hope your isolation ends soon.
The Gray Ravens are awaiting your return.
Virtual visiting time over. The isolated patient should now follow their assigned schedule.

Params[2]: (All of a sudden I feel like I'm some zoo animal...)

Params[3]: Familiar engine rumblings blast through a connection channel.
If that's the answer you seek, then yes.

Params[2]: Looks like it wasn't that good.

Params[3]: You got some good intuition. How's that Construct on your team doing?

Params[4]: I don't know what you're talking about.

Params[3]: The sound of engines became louder in the channel, like it is protesting against something.

Params[2]: She's asking about you a lot, though.

Params[3]: She wants another go at it?
